titles.title: Supplementary data for 'Chapter 3: The impact of diagenetic processes on sediment-hosted massive sulfide ore distribution: Geochronological, stratigraphic, textural, and petrographic relationships between silica, barite and sulfides in the Anarraaq Zn-Pb-Ag deposit, Red Dog District, Alaska'

descriptions.description: Supplementary files associated with PhD thesis Chapter 3 - The impact of diagenetic processes on sediment-hosted massive sulfide ore distribution: Geochronological, stratigraphic, textural, and petrographic relationships between silica, barite and sulfides in the Anarraaq Zn-Pb-Ag deposit, Red Dog District, Alaska. This includes one figure and one data table. Figure S3.1: Drill core sub-sampled for Re-Os isotopic analysis. Table S3.1: Whole rock analyses of select subsamples of Anarraaq black shale analyzed for Re-Os. These data are also included as Fig. A1 and Tab. A1 in a manuscript submitted to Economic Geology.
